code: const apiRequest=async function(){let url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';let optionsObj=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;let errMsg=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:null;try{const response=await fetch(url,optionsObj);if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${response.status}`);}const result=await response.json();return result;}catch(err){console.error("apiRequest error:",err);errMsg=err.message;return errMsg;}};export default apiRequest;
